front.title: Multiple NFSv4 Domain Namespace Deployment Guidelines

abstract.t: This document describes administrative constraints to the deployment of the NFSv4 protocols required for the construction of an NFSv4 file system namespace supporting the use of multiple NFSv4 domains and utilizing multi-domain capable file systems. Also described are administrative constraints to name resolution and security services appropriate to such a system. Such a namespace is a suitable way to enable a Federated File System supporting the use of multiple NFSv4 domains.
